value: 2834 - Pharmaceutical Preparations Summary > Medical Developments International Limited (MVP) is an Australian company delivering emergency medical solutions, including pain relief and respiratory products, and is dedicated to improving patient outcomes. The Company manufactures Penthrox, a non-opioid trauma & emergency pain relief product. It is approved in Australia for pain relief in settings such as hospitals, ambulance services and short procedures, in accordance with the approved Product Information.
